name: Patrick Martin 0001
content: Patrick Martin Patrick Martin Professor Emeritus Scotiabank Scholar Military Health Senior Research Scientist with the Canadian Institute for Military and Veteran Health Research (CIMVHR) I joined the School of Computing (then called the Department of Computer and Information Science) at Queens University in 1984. I retired from the School in 2018. I am a researcher with Canadian Institute for Military and Veteran Health Research (CIMVHR) and the Scotiabank Centre for Customer Analytics. My research interests include big data analytics, data integration, database system performance, and self-adaptive software systems.
